title: Apple’s iPhone Lightning Dock may have been discontinued, but you can still find it in some countries
content:
Since the very first iPhone, Apple has always offered its own Charging Dock, which has been updated multiple times since 2007 to support new iPhone models. However, Apple seems to have discontinued the product, as the iPhone Lightning Dock is no longer available in most countries.

more…

The post Apple’s iPhone Lightning Dock may have been discontinued, but you can still find it in some countries appeared first on 9to5Mac.
description: Apple seems to have discontinued its iPhone Lightning Dock, as the product is no longer available in most countries.
